2011-04-02

BtVS: Killed by Death / Art appreciation

So... it seems to me that young Ryan's art is strangely reminiscent in it's gruesomeness of not so young Giles' from a couple of years later...

Motorhead's Killed by Death was first released on the compilation album No Remorse and was one of the four songs on that album that killed my love for Motorhead.. but it was the best of the four so...
